text: Mark Giambruno (born 1957, in Placerville, California, died 2014) was an American 3D artist, art director, writer, and voice actor. Giambruno was an early employee of Mondo Media, and as such, worked on some of their earlier projects, he was also well known for being the voice of Lifty and Shifty, on the adult-animated web series Happy Tree Friends, before Kenn Navarro would take over the role of both of them after Giambruno left. Giambruno passed away in 2014, and Warren Graff would confirm his death on his TikTok. Category:1957 births Category:Year of death missing Category:American voice actors
title: Mark Giambruno
